name: Currently Reading
description: Books you are currently reading - stay motivated and on track everytime you open a new page.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; connect-src https://literal.club/graphql/; img-src https://assets.literal.club https://assets-ol.literal.club https://books.google.com;

author: stefpet@gmail.com
